description:
🔥 Welcome to the 13th and 1st PyMCon Web Series event of 2024!
Meet Assistant Professor Anne Reinarz from Durham University and Postdoctoral Researcher Linus Seelinger from the Karlsruhe Institute of Technology.

In this PyMCon speakers' interview video, they share their unexpected journeys into Uncertainty Quantification and High-Performance computing. Discover how their passion for numerical solutions and real-world applications shaped their careers, along with valuable advice for newcomers.

🎤 Join us for their upcoming PyMCon talk, "Enabling Uncertainty Quantification," where they will explore the intricacies of this field. The talk will be uploaded to our YouTube channel, and they will connect with you live during a Q&A session on the 29th Jan (at 3:00 pm UTC) and 30th Jan (at 6:30 am UTC) to delve deeper into the topic.

🚀 Stay tuned for their talk, and be sure to register for the live Q&A session today to ensure you don't miss out.

📌 For more information, check out our discourse post and RSVP to the meetup event for a reminder.
🔗 PyMCon Website: https://pymcon.com/events/
👉 Discourse Post for more details and discussion: https://discourse.pymc.io/t/13583
🔗 Register for the live Q&A session:
1. 29th Jan at 7 am PST (3:00 pm UTC)👉 https://www.meetup.com/pymc-online-meetup/events/298279180/
2. 30th Jan at 12 pm IST (6:30 am UTC)👉 https://www.meetup.com/pymc-online-meetup/events/298356399/


📢 PyMCon is a community conference that shares the latest in statistical practices, tricks, and tips. Submit your proposal for the PyMCon Web Series CFP and be part of this exciting community. 🔗 Submit your proposal here: https://pymcon.com/cfp/ 

📩 Join the PyMCon mailing list to stay up-to-date on the latest news, insights, and announcements. 🔗 Join the mailing list here: https://dashboard.mailerlite.com/forms/241188/73241617305175542/share 

🤝 Connect with us on Discourse and Meetup and be part of a vibrant community of statisticians, data analysts, and enthusiasts. 
📺 PyMCon Web Series: https://pymcon.com/ 
👥 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/pymc/ 
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/pymc_devs 
🤝 Meetup: https://www.meetup.com/pymc-online-meetup/

title: Anne Reinarz & Linus Seelinger
